testcase.name: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given user has logged in....................................................passed And user is at home page....................................................passed When user hovers over any random category...................................passed And user clicks sub-category if found.......................................passed Then page title should contain category or sub-category name................passed

testcase.name: User could change the currency
testcase.system-out: Given user go to home page..................................................passed When select Euro currency from the dropdown.................................passed Then Euro Symbol is shown on the 4 products displayed in Home page..........passed

testcase.name: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"......................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.name: User could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".....................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed
